code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    input logic [7:0] d,
    output logic [7:0] q
);

always @(negedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
        q <= 8'b00110100;
    end else begin
        q <= d;
    end
end

endmodule
[DONE]
```
